name: Lemon Curd Bars with Coconut
author: THEA
summary: This bar has the two crusts as requested, and has a strong tangy lemon taste, so much better than most of the lemon bar recipes out there due to the lemon curd and added coconut!
ingredients: ½ cup toasted and chopped almonds
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a large mixing bowl cream the butter
Add the flour, sugar and baking soda
Mix until the mixture forms coarse crumbs Pat 2/3 of the mixture into the bottom of one 9x13 inch baking pan
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes
Spread the lemon curd over the baked layer
To the remaining 1/3 of  crumb mixture add the coconut and the almonds
Sprinkle over the top of the lemon curd
Lower oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake bars for 25 minutes or until lightly browned
